title: Scrutineering Update
content: Scrutineering will start on June 14, 08:00 sharp in Paddock Zone B.

title: Welcome Note
content: Welcome to the official online notice board for Serres 2025! All important information and updates will be posted here.

title: Entry Form
content: Please use the following link to register: Go to Entry Form

title: Regulations & Technical Info
content: The event is governed by the FIA CEZ Circuit Regulations and Supplementary Bulletins. All cars must comply with BOP, minimum weight, and noise limits.

title: Bulletin test , B#5
content: The event is governed by the FIA CEZ Circuit.
